name: Shooting Heroes Rescue! Bite the Bullet. Modern Revenge’s Bloodshed Combat
name_original: Shooting Heroes Rescue! Bite the Bullet. Modern Revenge’s Bloodshed Combat
description:
Shoot the flying killer zombies and enemy shooters and safely reach to home land , jump to avoid incoming bullets and move left of right to avoid attacks of flying zombies , those zombies will try to eat your brain.
So be careful.
